## Description {#details}

===- <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/passes/droppedvariablestatsir-h">DroppedVariableStatsIR.h</a> - Opt Diagnostics -&#42;- C++ -&#42;-----------—===//

Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions. See <a href="https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt">https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt</a> for license information. SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception

===------------------------------------------------------------------—===//

Dropped Variable Statistics for Debug Information. Reports any number of #dbg&#95;value that get dropped due to an optimization pass.

===------------------------------------------------------------------—===//
